I'm just gonna repost the comment I made to other people on a Mordekaiser thread :

Let's talk milkshakes. Do you like milkshakes ? I guess you like milkshakes, but rarely order one.

You're at Starcall, your favorite coffee shop that also serves milkshakes.
There's this milkshake you love. It has everything you need : burst damage, sustained damage, tankyness, a mechanically easy kit. It also comes in METAL with spikes and suffering and pain and agony. HOW BADASS RIGHT ?

This milkshake is good. You keep ordering it. It tastes good. Maybe the spikes are a bit tough but heh, you got used to it.

Now there this Starcall's manager that decides that this milkshake isn't good enough. The thing is, all he ever did was some ridiculous iced coffees with an insane amount of toppings (cherries, chocolate cake, a lantern, a giant tornado...)
You start freaking out. WHY ? Why would they change your favorite milkshake's recipe ?

You wait to see what's going to happen.

This manager completely changes your milkshake. He removes all the core ingredients and add some really tasteless things. He also adds a little piece of sugar with "friendship is magic" written on it.
And on top of that, whenever you order one, you HAVE to buy another milkshake with it, which means you pay twice what you used to ! That's insane !

So you go to him, and ask why he didn't simply create a new milkshake for all his experimental needs. He completely ignores you. You yell, shout, punch him in the nuts try to get his attention. But he acts like you don't even exist...

In the end, you're standing in the coffee shop with a lot of people who are all hating this new milkshake and want their old recipe back, with the manager completely disregarding the entire fanbase of the old milkshake.

Now you understand what Mordekaiser mains feel like !

PS : That might have been too subtle, but the milkshake is mordekaiser

> [{quoted}](name=gamerguy13,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EELInjr7,comment-id=001b0000,timestamp=2015-08-23T05:39:46.118+0000)

> its diversity in the lane he goes to because hes completely different from the rest of the ones in that lane.

That still makes absolutely no sense.
Forcing a champion from a specific role to another is not diversity, it's fucking laziness.
Instead of making a balanced, easy champion, flexible enough to compete in more than 1 lane Riot makes overloaded champions that they KNOW will be nerfed.

The issue is that as an existing champion, players were previously invested in Mordekaiser. But he was generally a mid or top laner, and I would expect that most players who main him or play him frequently main one of those lanes as well, and many will not be interested in playing him bot lane. So there's naturally a strong negative reaction because Riot is taking away something they have invested a lot into (though Riot has said they want to keep his solo laning viable.)

Additionally, since he's not a marksman, it's unlikely that a lot of marksman mains will want to play Mordekaiser either.  The group he might appeal the most to is those who like running double-bruiser or the like bot lane, but they seem to be pretty small at the moment. Hopefully he doesn't end up without a playerbase due to his currently unique situation in bot lane.

Of course I want diversity, I'm sick of supporting {{champion:67}} every single time I'm last pick 

But I don't want it at the expense of Mordekaiser, a champion that I greatly enjoyed in top and mid much more. A new champion would have been better.

{{champion:245}}  See above
